style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;fontSize=21;fontFamily=Verdana;labelBorderColor=none;html=1;labelBackgroundColor=none;spacing=-1;sketch=1;curveFitting=1;jiggle=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-185" y="-450" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jE4i0ix0jdBQY1TOiI10-12" value="" style="edgeStyle=none;curved=1;rounded=1;hachureGap=4;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=21;startSize=8;endSize=8;spacing=-1;labelBackgroundColor=none;fontColor=default;verticalAlign=bottom;sketch=1;curveFitting=1;jiggle=2;" parent="1" source="jE4i0ix0jdBQY1TOiI10-11" target="jE4i0ix0jdBQY1TOiI10-1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jE4i0ix0jdBQY1TOiI10-13" style="edgeStyle=none;curved=1;rounded=1;hachureGap=4;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=21;startSize=8;endSize=8;spacing=-1;labelBackgroundColor=none;fontColor=default;sketch=1;curveFitting=1;jiggle=2;" parent="1" source="jE4i0ix0jdBQY1TOiI10-11" target="jE4i0ix0jdBQY1TOiI10-14" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-400" y="170" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="y-oSWSw2GZ8rfiSkiREr-34" style="edgeStyle=none;rounded=0;sketch=1;hachureGap=4;jiggle=2;curveFitting=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.25;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=16;" parent="1" source="jE4i0ix0jdBQY1TOiI10-11" target="y-oSWSw2GZ8rfiSkiREr-35" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-370" y="70" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jE4i0ix0jdBQY1TOiI10-11" value="<b style="font-size: 21px;">Arab-al Baqia<br style="font-size: 21px;"></b>(Living Arabs)" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;hachureGap=4;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=21;spacing=-1;labelBackgroundColor=none;sketch=1;curveFitting=1;jiggle=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-215" y="-210" width="150" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jE4i0ix0jdBQY1TOiI10-14" value="<h1 style="font-size: 21px; line-height: 100%;"><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Architects+Daughter" face="Architects Daughter" style="font-size: 21px;"><b style="font-size: 21px;">Adnani</b></font></h1><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Architects+Daughter" face="Architects Daughter" style="font-size: 21px;"><div style="font-size: 21px; line-height: 100%;"><ul style="font-size: 21px; line-height: 100%;"><li><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Architects+Daughter" face="Architects Daughter" style="font-size: 21px;"><b style="background-color: initial;">They are descendent of Ismail(as)</b></font></li><li style="font-size: 21px;"><span style="font-size: 21px;"><b style="font-size: 21px;">Prophet Muhammad PBUH was&nbsp;</b></span><b style="font-size: 21px; background-color: initial;">Adnani.</b></li><li style="font-size: 21px;"><span style="font-size: 21px;"><b style="font-size: 21px;">Adnani's and qahtani's are not related.</b></span></li><li style="font-size: 21px;"><span style="font-size: 21px;"><b style="font-size: 21px;">All arab tribes from Adnan.</b></span></li><li style="font-size: 21px;"><span style="font-size: 21px;"><b style="font-size: 21px;">They were Arab-al_musta'riba</b></span></li><li style="font-size: 21px;"><span style="font-size: 21px;"><b style="font-size: 21px;">Adnan was around Jesus(as)</b></span></li></ul></div></font>" style="rounded=1;html=1;hachureGap=4;align=left;textDirection=ltr;fontSize=21;spacing=-1;labelBackgroundColor=none;sketch=1;curveFitting=1;jiggle=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-1010" y="-160" width="430" height="230" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jE4i0ix0jdBQY1TOiI10-17" value="<div><b>Arab-al-baida (Extinct Arabs)</b></div><div>Eg: Aad, Thamud.</div><div><br></div><div>1. Thamud flourished around 3000BC&nbsp;</div><div>2. They Fled from Babel</div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;hachureGap=4;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=20;spacing=-1;labelBackgroundColor=none;sketch=1;curveFitting=1;jiggle=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-870" y="-540" width="210" height="340" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="y-oSWSw2GZ8rfiSkiREr-35" value="<ul><li><b>Qahtan</b></li></ul><div><b><br></b></div><ul><li><b style="background-color: initial;">He was considered as FATHER OF ARABS</b></li><li><b style="background-color: initial;">From His son named Ya-Arab came the word 'Arab'</b></li><li><b style="background-color: initial;">Who was Qahtan?</b></li><li><b style="background-color: initial;">He was decendent of son of Nooh(as) called SAM.</b></li><li><b style="background-color: initial;">Sam is the father of SEMITES.</b></li><li><b style="background-color: initial;">Qahtan existed way before Adnan.</b></li><li><b style="background-color: initial;">Qahtan is descendent of Ibrahim(as)</b></li><li><b style="background-color: initial;">Qahtan lived in soythern Arabia</b></li><li><b style="background-color: initial;">Kingdom of Saba is a prime example fo Qahtan in southern araba.</b></li><li><b style="background-color: initial;">They are Arab-al Aariba---they are True Arabs</b></li></ul>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;sketch=1;hachureGap=4;jiggle=2;curveFitting=1;fontFamily=Architects Daughter;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DArchitects%2BDaughter;fontSize=25;gradientColor=none;align=left;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-730" y="120" width="620" height="530" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

span.b: Adnani's and qahtani's are not related.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 214px; height: 1px; padding-top: 170px; margin-left: 139px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: "Architects Daughter"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 618px; height: 1px; padding-top: 925px; margin-left: 283px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 25px; font-family: "Architects Daughter"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

li.b: He was considered as FATHER OF ARABS
From His son named Ya-Arab came the word 'Arab'
He was decendent of son of Nooh(as) called SAM.
Sam is the father of SEMITES.
Kingdom of Saba is a prime example fo Qahtan in southern araba.
They are Arab-al Aariba---they are True Arabs

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
